section.title: extConf
section.para: When installing the extension the Extension Manager will let you set some values.

listitem.para: cz_simple_cal indexes recurring events. Here you can set until what date the indexing should be done. Use any valid format for the date type here - 2020-12-31 or +2 years could be some.

note.para: Don't forget to reindex your events when using a relative date. The index could be outdated else.

section.title: TypoScript
section.para: You can also configure the extension on page-level using TypoScript. Everything you configure goes into plugin.tx_czsimplecal

listitem.para: The page id where your records are stored. You can set multiple pages seperated by comma (,).

note.para: If you use tt_address for location and/or organizer, you also have to give the pids of these records.
